segments.text: This kitchen drawing captures a moment of everyday life gone awry.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: The adult woman stands there in her dress and apron.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: She's holding a plate, wiping it down carefully.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: Unbeknownst to her, the sink is running full tilt.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: Water is pouring over, flooding the floor in a mess.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: Her shoe is wet, but she keeps on drying.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: Meanwhile, the kids are up to no good on the other side.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: The boy on the stool is fishing cookies from the jar.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: He's balancing precariously, one hand on a plate.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: The girl is waiting patiently, hand outstretched.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: They think they're so sneaky, but it's risky business.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: The open window shows a peaceful yard, what a contrast.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: I hope someone turns off that faucet before it's too late.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: The puddle is widening, threatening more trouble.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: This scene is both funny and frightening in its innocence.
segments.speaker: PAR
